statements: UPDATE SurveyData SET response = 'Yes' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyData SET response = 'No', respondent_id = 3 WHERE question_id = 2;
UPDATE SurveyData SET response='Good' WHERE respondent_id=100 AND question_id=1;
UPDATE SurveyData SET timestamp=NOW(), response='Excellent' WHERE respondent_id=200 AND survey_id=5;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_name='Customer Feedback Survey', response='Satisfied' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE respondents SET age=30, location='New York' WHERE id=3
